Package de.lessvoid.nifty.input

Class NiftyMouseInputEvent

java.lang.Object
de.lessvoid.nifty.input.NiftyMouseInputEvent
public class NiftyMouseInputEvent extends Object
NiftyMouseInputEvent.

Please Note: This object is pool managed which means it requires a default constructor and an initialize method that resets all (!) member variables. Not doing this will lead to bad things happening while instances are reused!
